content.question: Which of the following characteristics of Mariko Mori's Pure Land suggests that the artist is interested in Buddhism?

choices.label: The lotus flower beneath the central figure
The placement of the small figures playing music
The use of delicate pastel colors throughout the work
The traditional dress of the central figure in kimono and sash

content.answer: The lotus flower beneath the central figure
